General.Name: E79 Resources Corp
General.Description: E79 Resources Corp., a resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold. It holds 100% interest in the Beaufort property covering an area of approximately 120 square kilometers located in the southwest of Victoria, Australia. In addition, the company holds interest in the Myrtleford property covering an area of approximately 418 square kilometers located in the north-east of Victoria, Australia. E79 Resources Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1030 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
